sentences.sentence: We spent a week on the Greek island of Kos.
sentences.translation: 我们在希腊的科斯岛上待了一个星期。

sentences.sentence: Margarito (38-7, 27 KOs) had a few good moments in the fight.
sentences.translation: 马加里托(38胜- 7负，27次击倒对手)在整场拳赛里很少有出彩的地方。

sentences.sentence: Dr Kos, from Syracuse University in the us, told BBC News: "we were critical of those events when we saw them."
sentences.translation: 来自美国锡拉丘兹大学的科斯博士对BBC新闻说：“我们在看到这些粒子事件时有些不满。”
